message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable.  I'm thinking of a price around $9,500. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  However, $7,500 is significantly below its true value. I could meet you at $9,000, which is a really good deal.  What do you say?
I'm not willing to go up to $9,000. I'm thinking more in the range of $8,200. Would you be willing to meet me there?
